mapper.select: SELECT b_cart_order_address_id, b_cart_order_address_address, xt_provinceID, xt_cityID, xt_districtID, b_member_id, b_cart_order_address_status FROM b_cart_order_address WHERE 1=1

SELECT b_cart_order_address_id, b_cart_order_address_address, xt_provinceID, xt_cityID, xt_districtID, b_member_id, b_cart_order_address_status FROM b_cart_order_address WHERE b_cart_order_address_id=#{b_cart_order_address_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_cart_order_address ( b_cart_order_address_id, b_cart_order_address_address, xt_provinceID, xt_cityID, xt_districtID, b_member_id, b_cart_order_address_status ) VALUES ( #{b_cart_order_address_id}, #{b_cart_order_address_address}, #{xt_provinceID}, #{xt_cityID}, #{xt_districtID}, #{b_member_id}, #{b_cart_order_address_status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE b_cart_order_address SET b_cart_order_address_id = #{b_cart_order_address_id}, b_cart_order_address_address = #{b_cart_order_address_address}, xt_provinceID = #{xt_provinceID}, xt_cityID = #{xt_cityID}, xt_districtID = #{xt_districtID}, b_member_id = #{b_member_id}, b_cart_order_address_status = #{b_cart_order_address_status} WHERE b_cart_order_address_id=#{b_cart_order_address_id}
mapper.delete:
